00099           public function doadmin($username,$password,$action,$soap,$options=false){
00100                     $this->buildadminclient();
00101                     
00102                     if(count($options)>0){
00103                               $this->options=$options;
00104                     }else{
00105                               $this->options=$this->defaultopions;
00106                     }
00107                     
00108                     $this->admin_username=$username;
00109                     $this->admin_password=$password;
00110                     
00111                     $a=$this->dosoap_admin($action,$soap);
00112                     
00113                     return $a;
00114           }

00127           public function douser($username,$action,$urn,$soap,$options=array()){
00128                     
00129                     $this->user_username=$username;
00130                     $this->builduserclient();

00132                     if(count($options)>0){
00133                               $this->options=$options;
00134                     }else{
00135                               $this->options=$this->defaultopions;
00136                     }
00137                     
00138                     $a=$this->dosoap_user($action,$urn,$soap);
00139                     
00140                     return $a;

00150           public function __construct(){
00151                     if(file_exists($this->path.$this->_cachefile)){
00152                     
00153                               $vars=file_get_contents($this->path.$this->_cachefile);
00154                               $vars=unserialize($vars);
00155                               
00156                               if(is_array($vars)){
00157                                         $this->cacheconfig=$vars;
00158                               }
00159                     }
00160                     $this->_timestamp=time().'000';
00161                     $this->path=dirname(__FILE__).'/';
00162           }

00173           private function dosoap_admin($action,$soap,$forcenewlogin=false){
00174                     
00175                     $this->admin_login($forcenewlogin);
00176                     
00177                     $soap_header='
00178 <context xmlns="urn:zimbra">
00179 <authToken>'.$this->admin_authtoken.'</authToken>
00180 <sessionId id="'.$this->admin_sessid.'">'.$this->admin_sessid.'</sessionId> 
00181 </context>';
00182                     $header=new SoapHeader(
00183                               'urn:zimbra',
00184                               'context',
00185                               new SoapVar($soap_header,XSD_ANYXML)
00186                     );
00187                     
00188                     $params=array(
00189                               new SoapVar($soap,XSD_ANYXML)
00190                     );
00191                     
00192                     
00193                     $options=array('uri'=>'urn:zimbraAdmin');
00194                     
00195                     $response=$this->dosoap($action,$header,$params,$options);
00196                     $response_a=$this->xml2array($response);
00197                                                             
00198                     
00199                     // Bei Fehlern...                  
00200                     if(isset($response_a['soap:Body']['soap:Fault']['soap:detail']['Error']['Code'])){
00201                               
00202                               $err=$response_a['soap:Body']['soap:Fault']['soap:detail']['Error']['Code'];
00203                               
00204                               // Wenn AUTH fehlgeschlagen, aufhören...
00205                               if($err=='account.AUTH_FAILED'){
00206                                         echo "AUTH FAILED";
00207                                         return false;
00208                               
00209                               // Wenn Fehler und newlogin nicht getan, sondern auf vergangene Session vertraut => nochmal probieren
00210                               // mit erzwungenem einloggen
00211                               }else if($err=='service.AUTH_REQUIRED'){
00212                                         if(!$forcenewlogin){
00213                                                   return $this->dosoap_admin($action,$soap,true);                                 
00214                                         }else{
00215                                                   echo "AUTH FAILED (ENDLESS)";
00216                                                   return false;
00217                                         }
00218                               }
00219                     }
00220                               
00221                     
00222                     return $this->xml2array($response);
00223           }

00236                     
00237                     $this->user_login($forcenewlogin);
00238                     
00239                     $soap_header='
00240 <context xmlns="urn:zimbra">
00241 <authToken>'.$this->user_authtoken. '</authToken>
00242 <sessionId id="'.$this->user_sessid.'">'.$this->user_sessid.'</sessionId> 
00243 </context>';
00244 
00245                     $header=new SoapHeader(
00246                               'urn:zimbra',
00247                               'context',
00248                               new SoapVar($soap_header,XSD_ANYXML)
00249                     );
00250                               
00251                     $params=array(
00252                               new SoapVar($soap,XSD_ANYXML)
00253                     );
00254                     
00255                     $options=array('uri'=>'urn:'.$urn);
00256                     
00257                     $response=$this->dosoap($action,$header,$params,$options);
00258                     
00259                     $response_a=$this->xml2array($response);
00260                     
00261                     
00262                     // Bei Fehlern...
00263                     if(isset($response_a['soap:Body']['soap:Fault']['soap:detail']['Error']['Code'])){
00264                               
00265                               $err=$response_a['soap:Body']['soap:Fault']['soap:detail']['Error']['Code'];
00266                               
00267                               // Wenn AUTH fehlgeschlagen, aufhören...
00268                               if($err=='account.AUTH_FAILED'){
00269                                         echo "AUTH FAILED";
00270                                         return false;
00271                               
00272                               // Wenn Fehler und newlogin nicht getan, sondern auf vergangene Session vertraut => nochmal probieren
00273                               // mit erzwungenem einloggen
00274                               }else if($err=='service.AUTH_REQUIRED'){
00275                                         if(!$forcenewlogin){
00276                                                   return $this->dosoap_user($urn,$action,$soap,true);                                       
00277                                         }else{
00278                                                   echo "AUTH FAILED (ENDLESS)";
00279                                                   return false;
00280                                         }
00281                               }
00282                     }
00283           
00284                     return $this->xml2array($response);
00285           }         
00286           
00294           private function admin_login($forcenew=false){
00295                     // if not forcenewlogin and a  AUTH and SESSID exists and they are not expired... 
00296                     // => take them and return...
00297                     if(!$forcenew && isset($this->cacheconfig['admin'][$this->admin_username])){
00298                               
00299                               $data=$this->cacheconfig['admin'][$this->admin_username];
00300                               if(     isset($data['sessid']) && isset($data['authtoken']) && isset($data['endtime']) 
00301                                   && mktime()<$data['endtime']
00302                               ){
00303                                         $this->admin_sessid=$data['sessid'];
00304                                         $this->admin_authtoken=$data['authtoken'];
00305                                         return;
00306                               }
00307                     //otherwise login admin account
00308                     }
00309                     
00310                     $header=new SoapHeader('urn:zimbra','context');
00311                               
00312                     $params=array(
00313                               new SoapParam($this->admin_username,'name'),
00314                               new SoapParam($this->admin_password,'password')
00315                     );
00316 
00317                     $options=array('uri'=>'urn:zimbraAdmin');
00318                     
00319                     $result=$this->dosoap('AuthRequest',$header,$params,$options,true);
00320                     
00321                     // Store result to cache
00322                     $this->admin_sessid=$result['sessionId'];
00323                     $this->admin_authtoken=$result['authToken'];
00324                     $this->admin_endtime=mktime()+$result['lifetime']/1000; //time comes in ms...
00325                     $this->setcachvalue();
00326           }
00327 
00336           private function user_login($forcenew=false){
00337                     
00338                     // if not forcenewlogin and a  AUTH and SESSID exists and they are not expired... 
00339                     // => take them and return...
00340                     if(!$forcenew && isset($this->cacheconfig['user'][$this->user_username])){
00341                     
00342                               $data=$this->cacheconfig['user'][$this->user_username];
00343                               
00344                               if(    isset($data['sessid']) && isset($data['authtoken']) && isset($data['endtime']) 
00345                                   && mktime()<$data['endtime']
00346                                 ){
00347                                         $this->user_sessid=$data['sessid'];
00348                                         $this->user_authtoken=$data['authtoken'];
00349                                         return;
00350                               }
00351                     // otherwise login User
00352                     }
00353                     
00354                     // PreAuth
00355                     $by_value='name';
00356           
00357                     $preauth_uncrypt=$this->user_username.'|'.$by_value.'|'.$this->_preauth_expiration.'|'.$this->_timestamp; 
00358                     $preauth_crypt=hash_hmac('sha1',$preauth_uncrypt,$this->_preAuthKey);
00359                                         
00360                     $soap='
00361 <account by="name">'.$this->user_username.'</account> 
00362 <preauth timestamp="'.$this->_timestamp.'" expires="'.$this->_preauth_expiration.'">'.$preauth_crypt.'</preauth>
00363 ';
00364                     
00365                     $header=new SoapHeader('urn:zimbra','context');
00366                     $params=array(new SoapVar($soap,XSD_ANYXML));
00367                     
00368                     $options=array('uri'=>'urn:zimbraAccount');
00369                     
00370                     $result=$this->dosoap('AuthRequest',$header,$params,$options,true);
00371                     
00372                     // Store result to cache
00373                     $this->user_sessid=$result['sessionId'];
00374                     $this->user_authtoken=$result['authToken'];
00375                     $this->user_endtime=mktime()+$result['lifetime']/1000; // Kommt in ms an interessanter weise...?
00376                               
00377                     $this->setcachvalue();
00378           }

00393           private function dosoap($action,$header,$params,$options,$loginaction=false){
00394                               
00395                     try{
00396                               $result = $this->client->__soapCall(
00397                                         $action, 
00398                                         $params, 
00399                                         $options,
00400                                         $header
00401                               );
00402 
00403                     }catch (SoapFault $exception) {
00404                     }
00405                     
00406                     if(zimbraConfig::debug){
00407                               echo "<pre>\n\n=============== SOAP ANFANG =======================\n";
00408                               
00409                               echo "\n\nREQUEST:m\n";
00410                               print_r($this->client->__getLastRequest());
00411                               print_r( $this->xml2array($this->client->__getLastRequest()));
00412                               
00413                               echo "\n\nRESPONSEm:\n";
00414                               print_r($this->client->__getLastResponse());
00415                               print_r( $this->xml2array($this->client->__getLastResponse()));
00416                               echo "\n====================SOAP ENDE ==================\n\n<pre>";
00417                     }
00418                     
00419                     // Bei Login kommt hier der authtoken, sessid usw. zurück.
00420                     if($loginaction){
00421                               if(isset($result)){
00422                                         return $result;
00423                               }else{
00424                                         return false;
00425                               }
00426                     }else{
00427                               return $this->client->__getLastResponse();
00428                     }
00429           }

00440           private function soaperr($text,$client, $exception=''){
00441                     
00442                     
00443                     ob_start();
00444                     echo "<pre>\n\n=============== SOAP ERROR ANFANG =======================\n";
00445                     echo "$text \n";
00446                     
00447                     echo "\n\nRESPONSE:m\n";
00448                     print_r($this->client->__getLastRequest());
00449                     print_r( $this->xml2array($this->client->__getLastRequest()));
00450                     
00451                     echo "\n\nRESPONSEm:\n";
00452                     print_r($this->client->__getLastResponse());
00453                     print_r( $this->xml2array($this->client->__getLastResponse()));
00454                     echo "\n====================SOAP ERROR ENDE ==================\n\n<pre>";
00455                     
00456                     $out=ob_get_clean();
00457                     $out=$out."\n=======================".date('d.m.Y H:i')."==============\n";
00458                     
00459                     zlog::errlog($out);
00460 
00461           }

00469           private function builduserclient(){
00470                     if($this->client_user==null){
00471                               $this->client_user=new SoapClient(null,
00472                                         array(
00473                                                   'location' => $this->_userlocation,
00474                                                   'uri' => "urn:zimbra",
00475                                                   'trace' => 1,
00476                                                   'exceptions' => 1,
00477                                                   'soap_version' => SOAP_1_1,
00478                                                   'style' => SOAP_RPC,
00479                                                   'use' => SOAP_LITERAL
00480                                         )
00481                               );
00482                     }
00483                     $this->client=&$this->client_user;
00484           }

00492           private function buildadminclient(){

00496                                                   'location' => $this->_adminlocation,
00497                                                   'uri' => "urn:zimbraAdmin",
00498                                                   'trace' => 1,
00499                                                   'exceptions' => 1,
00500                                                   'soap_version' => SOAP_1_1,
00501                                                   'style' => SOAP_RPC,
00502                                                   'use' => SOAP_LITERAL
00503                                         )
00504                               );
00505                     }
00506                     $this->client=&$this->client_admin;
00507           }

00509           // donnotaskey: Ausschalten: bei <a n="zimbramailirgendwas">Value</a> => array[zimbramailirgendwas]=Value
00517           function xml2array($contents){
00518                     
00519                     if(isset($this->options['parse']) && $this->options['parse']===false){
00520                               return $contents;
00521                     }
00522                     
00523                     // XML Parser herrichten...
00524                     ini_set('include_path', $this->path.'PEAR');
00525                     set_include_path($this->path.'PEAR');
00526                     
00527                     require_once 'XML/Unserializer.php';
00528                     $options=array(
00529                               XML_UNSERIALIZER_OPTION_ATTRIBUTES_PARSE    => true,
00530                               //XML_UNSERIALIZER_OPTION_ATTRIBUTES_ARRAYKEY => false
00531                     );
00532                     
00533                     //user options...
00534                     if(!isset($this->options['donnotaskey']) || $this->options['donnotaskey']!=1){
00535                               $options['keyAttribute']='n'; 
00536                     }
00537                     
00538                     //  be careful to always use the ampersand in front of the new operator                                       
00539                     $unserializer = new XML_Unserializer(
00540                               $options
00541                     );
00542                     
00543                     
00544                     $status = $unserializer->unserialize($contents, false);   
00545 
00546                     if(PEAR::isError($status)){
00547                               echo 'Error: ' . $status->getMessage();
00548                     }else{
00549                               $d = $unserializer->getUnserializedData();
00550                               return $d;
00551                     }
00552           }
00553           
00561           private function setcachvalue(){
00562                     
00563                     if($this->admin_username!=''){
00564                               $a=&$this->cacheconfig['admin'][$this->admin_username];
00565                               $a=array(
00566                                         'authtoken'=>$this->admin_authtoken,
00567                                         'sessid'=>$this->admin_sessid,
00568                                         'endtime'=>$this->admin_endtime
00569                               );
00570                               //echo "dateY: ".date('d.m.Y H:i',$a['endtime']);
00571                     }
00572                     
00573                     if($this->user_username!=''){
00574                               $a=&$this->cacheconfig['user'][$this->user_username];
00575                               $a=array(
00576                                         'authtoken'=>$this->user_authtoken,
00577                                         'sessid'=>$this->user_sessid,
00578                                         'endtime'=>$this->user_endtime
00579                               );
00580                     }
00581                     
00582                     $vars=serialize($this->cacheconfig);
00583                     
00584                     file_put_contents($this->path.$this->_cachefile,$vars);
00585           }

00610           public function doUpload($username, $files){
00611                     // Authentifizieren...
00612                     // einmal nur als user...
00613                     // Wegen autthoken...
00614                     
00615                     //echo "Test".$this->user_authtoken."test";
00616                     $retval=false;
00617                     
00618                     // Files uploaden...
00619                     if(!is_array($files)){
00620                               $files=array($files);
00621                     }
00622                     
00623                     // Post array vorbereiten...
00624                     $post=array();
00625                     
00626                     $i=0;     
00627                     foreach($files as $filetoupload){
00628                               $filepath=$this->getUploadFile($filetoupload);
00629                               if($filepath!==false){
00630                                         $post['file'.$i]='@'.$filepath;
00631                                         $i++;
00632                               }
00633                     }
00634                     
00635                     // Wenn noch nicht eingellogged => einloggen
00636                     if(strlen($this->user_authtoken)<3){
00637                               $this->user_username=$username;
00638                               $this->builduserclient();
00639                               $this->user_login(true); // with forcenew...
00640                     }
00641                     
00642                     $post['requestId']='client_token'; // Hier kann man irgendwas einfügen...
00643 
00644                     // Wenn Files zum uploaden da...
00645                     if($i>0){
00646                               
00647                               $this->builduserclient();
00648                               $this->user_username=$username;
00649                               $this->user_login();
00650                               
00651                               $ch = curl_init();
00652                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0);
00653                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_VERBOSE, 0);
00654                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
00655                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_USERAGENT, 'Mozilla/4.0 (compatible;)');
00656                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $this->_uploadlocation.'?fmt=raw' );
00657                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
00658                               curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_COOKIE,'ZM_AUTH_TOKEN='.$this->user_authtoken);
00659                               
00660                               // Vorfühlen
00661                               $response = curl_exec($ch);
00662                               if(strpos($response,'HTTP ERROR: 401')!==false){
00663                                         echo "AUTH FAILED1";
00664                                         // Neu Login erzwingen...
00665                                         $this->user_login(true);
00666                                         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_COOKIE,'ZM_AUTH_TOKEN='.$this->user_authtoken);
00667                                         $response = curl_exec($ch);
00668                               }
00669                               
00670                               // Wenn leerer Upload geklappt hat
00671                               if(strpos($response,"204,'null'")!==false){
00672                                         curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $post); 
00673                                         $response = curl_exec($ch);
00674                                         
00675                                         $response=preg_match('/200,\'client_token\',\'(.*)\'/msU',$response,$out);
00676                                         $retval=explode(',',$out[1]);
00677                               
00678                               // Wenn nicht...
00679                               }else{
00680                                         echo "Fehler: AUTH";
00681                                         p($response);
00682                               }
00683                               
00684                               //p($out);
00685                               $this->cleantmp_filedir();
00686 
00687                     }else{
00688                               echo "No files to Upload";
00689                     }
00690                     
00691                     return $retval;
00692           }

00694           
00695           // [i][0]=ordner
00696           // [i][1]=file (Ohne path!)
00700           var $tmp_filedir=array();
00701 
00709           private function getUploadFile($filetoupload){
00710                     
00711                     $urlext=array('http');
00712                     
00713                     $pathtofile=$filetoupload;
00714                     
00715                     foreach($urlext as $prot){
00716                               
00717                               // if it's an Webfile...
00718                               if(strpos($filetoupload,$prot.'://')!==false){
00719                                         
00720                                         // Ordner, damit der Filename erhalten bleibt!
00721                                         $pathtofile_dir=$this->path.'/'.$this->_tmpdir.'/'.mktime().'_'.rand();
00722                                         
00723                                         mkdir($pathtofile_dir,0777);
00724                                         
00725                                         // Filenamen holen..
00726                                         $fileinfo=pathinfo($filetoupload);
00727           
00728                                         $pathtofile=$pathtofile_dir.'/'.$fileinfo['basename'];
00729                                         
00730                                         // save file temporaly on server, for uploading
00731                                         // Check, if it exists..
00732                                         $fp=@fopen($filetoupload,'r');
00733                                         if($fp!==false){
00734                                                   // filegetcontent is binary safe.
00735                                                   $bits=file_get_contents($filetoupload);
00736                                                   file_put_contents($pathtofile,$bits);
00737                                                   
00738                                                   // mark it for delete
00739                                                   $this->tmp_filedir[]=array($pathtofile_dir,$fileinfo['basename']);
00740                                         
00741                                         }
00742                                         if($fp!==false)fclose($fp);
00743           
00744                                         break;
00745                               }
00746                     }
00747                     
00748                     // Wenn datei nicht lokal exisitiert...
00749                     if(!file_exists($pathtofile)){
00750                               echo "File not found: $filetoupload<br>\n";
00751                               return false;
00752                     }
00753                     
00754                     return $pathtofile;
00755           }
00756           
00763           private function cleantmp_filedir(){
00764                     if(isset($this->tmp_filedir)){
00765                               foreach($this->tmp_filedir as $d){
00766                                         unlink($d[0].'/'.$d[1]);
00767                                         rmdir($d[0]);
00768                               }
00769                     }
00770           }
